# LLMs.txt - The Recovery Machine

## Business Overview
The Recovery Machine is a mobile wellness service that delivers professional cold plunge and infrared sauna therapy directly to customers' locations in the Greater Los Angeles Area. We provide commercial-grade recovery equipment with certified specialists to guide each session.

## Core Services

### Cold Plunge Therapy
- Professional-grade cold plunge tanks with precision temperature control (38-55Â°F)
- Commercial filtration systems for optimal water quality
- Guided sessions with certified recovery specialists
- Mobile delivery and setup at customer location
- Health benefits: reduced inflammation, enhanced recovery, improved circulation

### Infrared Sauna Sessions  
- Full-spectrum infrared wavelengths (near, mid, far)
- Deep tissue healing and detoxification
- Professional oversight and safety protocols
- Complete mobile service with setup and cleanup
- Health benefits: muscle recovery, stress relief, improved sleep

### Combo Recovery Sessions
- 45-minute sessions combining cold plunge and infrared sauna
- Optimized protocols for maximum therapeutic benefit
- Professional guidance throughout the experience
- Premium accessories and amenities included

## Technology Stack

### Frontend
- **Framework**: Next.js 15 with App Router
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS v4
- **UI Components**: Custom component library with Radix UI primitives
- **Icons**: Lucide React
- **State Management**: React hooks and context

### Backend & Database
- **Database**: Supabase (PostgreSQL)
- **Authentication**: Supabase Auth with magic links and password options
- **Real-time**: Supabase real-time subscriptions
- **API**: Next.js API routes with server actions

### Payment Processing
- **Primary**: Bolt Payment SDK for secure transactions
- **Features**: Subscription management, one-time payments, setup fees
- **Security**: PCI-compliant payment processing

### Integrations
- **Maps**: Google Maps API for location validation and distance calculation
- **Email**: Resend for transactional emails and notifications
- **SMS**: Twilio for booking reminders and communications
- **Social**: Instagram API for social proof and content

### Infrastructure
- **Hosting**: Vercel with edge functions
- **CDN**: Vercel CDN for static assets
- **Analytics**: Vercel Analytics for performance monitoring
- **Monitoring**: Sentry for error tracking and performance

## Pricing Structure

### Weekly Recovery Membership
- **Monthly Cost**: $400/month
- **Frequency**: 4 sessions per month (weekly)
- **Savings**: 75% compared to individual session pricing
- **Setup Fee**: $250-$500 (based on distance from service area)

### Add-Ons & Extras
- **Additional Sessions**: $150 per extra visit
- **Family Members**: $75 per additional person per session
- **Premium Accessories**: Included with membership

### Service Area Pricing
- **Core Los Angeles**: Standard setup fee
- **Extended Areas**: Distance-based pricing calculation
- **Travel Radius**: Up to 50 miles from LA metro center
